reviews.review: Найс
Very good

Unarguably one of my favorite PC games of all times, Counter-Strike: Source is a MUST-PLAY for every PC gamer! Having been played for over 5 years by many, casual and competitive players alike, it's no surprise that this game holds up to this date, and since this mod was made by Valve, makes this ever more of a unique, fun and somewhat balanced experience. 

This game's straight-forward, teamplay-strategy gameplay is what sets CS:S apart from "Call Of Duty-esque" games we see on the market nowadays: it offers intensity to the matches, making each round feel fresh and new. The gunplay is also different, but balanced: no gun is ever the same (obviously), and the in-game money you earn from kills and completing objectives  will make you decide between an expensive AWP and a helpful Kevlar vest. 
That, and the fact, that this game's mod-friendly increases the replay value considerably, makes you wanting for more Counter-Strike, even after a long hiatus.

Counter-Strike: Source is the epitome of the few games that have aged qute well since their release when we were just fledgling gamers. For some of us, Counter-Strike holds a special place in our hearts. We get a overwhelming sense of nostalgia that races through our concious when we reminisce about our moments in Counter-Strike. I was first introduced to Counter-Strike, or more specifically, CS:S, some time in 2009, through a YouTube video of the community made mod Zombie Escape. I knew immediately from that point on that I absolutely had to play this game. The propsect of pitting humans and zombies against one another enticed me, though at this time I had no real clue as to what the actual base gamemode of CS:S even entailed. Around the same time of this discovery of mine, I became so engrossed in other video games that I became sidetracked, only to start up my escapade in Counter Strike around late-2013. Ever since then, GFL has been my main source of quality (and autistic) Zombie Escape. I have always loved the community, I have always loved the players, I have always loved the fond memories which I have accrued from my time on GFL, and most of all.. I have always loved soloing maps, only to make BOT Keith mad. If you could not tell, I have no regrets with my time playing Counter-Strike: Source. I am grateful for everything that GFL has stood for these past few years. My only hope now is to see GFLClan.ru live and prosper on, to spread it's wings and prosper so greatly that I can continue to make more friends and have so many more pleasant and humorous memories. As far as I can tell, for the foreseeable future GFL and CS:S still have so much more time left to live.

Das Spiel Counter Strike: Source ist ein älterer Taktik Shooter und war zu Release ein Schönes Spiel und ist es Heute noch.
Es bietet die Klassischen Spielermodi Bombenentschärfung und Geiselbefreiung.
Andererseits gibt es auch von der Community mehrere verschiedene Spielermodi wie zbs. Surf oder Deathrun etc.

Die meisten waffen fühlen sich sehr Kraftvoll an und sind alle etwas besonderes.
In der Deutschen version wurden jedoch die Waffen unbenannt wie zum Beispiel die SG553 in der Deutschen Version "Krieg" und die Deutsche Syncro des Teamfunks ist in meinen Augen sehr
mies. "Spielt lieber auf english"
Die Grafik ist natürlich nicht die beste, das Spiel ist aber schon ein paar jahre alt und dem Spiel hat es nicht geschadet.

Wunderbares Spiel, empfehle es jedem!
